item.title: 'Mandate for change': Zohran Mamdani wins New York City mayoral election
item.description: It is a historic moment as Mamdani also becomes the first South Asian and first Muslim to lead the city.

item.title: At least seven people killed after UPS cargo plane crashes in Kentucky
item.description: Eleven others were injured when the plane exploded during takeoff near Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport.

item.title: Israel says Hamas returned body of Israeli-US soldier held hostage
item.description: Itay Chen's remains were returned to Israel via the Red Cross on Tuesday, meaning seven dead hostages now remain in Gaza.

item.title: France investigates Shein over sex dolls as it opens first store in world in Paris
item.description: Shein's fast-fashion outlet inside Paris department store BHV prompts several French brands to leave.

item.title: In Mamdani's New York win, India's Nehru finds an echo
item.description: At his New York victory rally, Zohran Mamdani gave a nod to Nehruâ€™s iconic speech marking India's independence.
